title: Represent
overview: A youth center leader from the suburbs of Paris becomes a finalist in the presidential election. But is France truly ready for its first Black president?

title: Band of Brothers
overview: The story of Easy Company, 506th Regiment of the 101st Airborne Division, U.S. Army. Based on interviews with survivors of Easy Company, as well as soldiers' journals and letters, the series chronicles the experiences of these young men who knew extraordinary bravery and extraordinary fear.

title: Black Mirror
overview: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

title: Loups garous
overview: 13 players, specialists in strategy and deception, compete in real-time for a life-sized game of Werewolves.

title: The Apothecary Diaries
overview: Maomao lived a peaceful life with her apothecary father. Until one day, she’s sold as a lowly servant to the emperor’s palace. But she wasn’t meant for a compliant life among royalty. So when imperial heirs fall ill, she decides to step in and find a cure! This catches the eye of Jinshi, a handsome palace official who promotes her. Now, she’s making a name for herself solving medical mysteries!

title: Arcane

alternateTitles.title: Arcane AKA Arcane League of Legends

overview: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

title: The Penguin
overview: This thrilling crime drama follows Oswald “Oz” Cobb’s quest for control in Gotham City. With the city in peril following the seawall’s collapse, Oz seeks to fill the power vacuum left by the death of Carmine Falcone and finally give his mother Francis the life he’s always promised. But first, Oz must confront his enemies, including Carmine’s children, Sofia Falcone and Alberto Falcone; the Maroni family, led by their imprisoned patriarch, Salvatore Maroni; and Oz’s own demoralizing reputation as “the Penguin.”

title: Squid Game
overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

title: The Parisian Agency: Exclusive Properties

alternateTitles.title: L'agence : L'immobilier de luxe en famille

overview: This reality series follows the Kretz family and their luxury property business as they help clients buy and sell fabulous homes in France and abroad.

title: Bref.
overview: In life we are born, at the end we die. Between the two, things happens, in short, it is the story of a guy between the two.

title: En vol avec les as de l'armée de l'air
sortTitle: en vol avec les as de larmée de lair
path: /downloads/En vol avec les as de l'armée de l'air

title: Severance
overview: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.
